contentList.content: Crafted from the darkest abyssal ores found deep within the Underdark, this armor emanates a dim, silvery light from moon-shaped patterns intricately etched onto its surface.

The supple leather of these gloves was blessed under the radiance of the full moon. Embroidered with silvery threads depicting the dance of drow priestesses, they offer the wearer heightened tactile sensitivity.
Crafted from the hide of a chitinous Underdark beast, these boots are as hard as stone but quiet as a whisper, turning each step taken into a graceful dance move.
Made from the night-black silk of rare Underdark spiders, this cloak seems to shimmer with a constellation of stars.
This hood, woven from the threads of moonlit nights, offers a unique duality. In darkness, it shimmers with a faint ethereal glow, but in the light, it camouflages its wearer seamlessly.
